title: English Learner Assessment Policy Analysis and Field Application Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A process analyzing the practical application challenges of English learner assessment policies by referencing U.S. public school cases, with emphasis on limitations of assessment tools like the W-APT test and exploring alternatives

learning_goals: Explain core principles and legal requirements of English learner assessment policies
Critically analyze the operational methods and limitations of assessment tools such as the W-APT test
Propose improvement strategies for assessment policies in multicultural educational environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
